name: Experience (Startups & Contract Work)
description: Experience across early-stage startups and contract roles, owning features end-to-end.

experienceDescription: Owned and built complex, scalable UI systems for RFQ capture, quoting, approvals, and invoicing workflows
Designed component-driven frontend architecture powering dynamic, multi-step business processes
Implemented AI-powered features including PDF/Image → quote extraction, email-ingested RFQs, and product recommendations
Collaborated closely with backend teams on API contracts, data models, and ERP integrations for quote-to-cash automation
Improved workflow usability and efficiency for manufacturing customer teams
Maintained and improved 50+ enterprise-grade integrations on a no-code automation platform.
Built and optimized React + TypeScript components for AI-driven workflows.
Developed LLM-powered modal experiences for automation engines.
Reduced integration delivery time by 10x using AI-based tooling.
Optimized APIs, reduced latency, and improved sync performance.
Contributed to the visual workflow builder enabling zero-code integrations.
Role impacted by a temporary company pause due to funding constraints.
Designed a scalable PostgreSQL schema using Prisma for complex relational data.
Led frontend engineering using React + Tailwind to build polished UIs.
Architected backend with Node.js + Prisma achieving sub-150ms API responses.
Developed real-time analytics powering actionable insights.
Implemented caching layers + CDN deployment to reduce latency.
Owned the entire development lifecycle across frontend, backend, and deployment.
Designed & developed frontend for a prediction-market analytics platform on Aptos.
Built reusable UI components, accelerating development speed.
Delivered premium analytics features and revenue-model UI flows.
Improved performance by 40% through bundling + render optimizations.
Designed clear UX flows that improved user engagement.
Created UI documentation and internal design guidelines.
